Uses of Package
es.upm.pproject.miniproject.miniproject

  • Classes in es.upm.pproject.miniproject.miniproject used by es.upm.pproject.miniproject.miniproject 
    Class Description
    Course
    This class allows you to create a course object.
    CourseAlreadyExistsException
    Thrown when an application attempts to register a course that was already registered.
    CourseBlankInputException
    Thrown when an application attempts to create a course with one or more blank or null fields or a course code <=0.
    EmailFormatException
    Thrown when an application attempts to create a student with an e-mail that does not contain a '@' or that ends with a '.'.
    FullCourseException
    Thrown when an application attempts to enroll a student in a course that already has 50 students enrolled in it.
    InterfaceEnrollmentManager
    The EnrollmentManager interface facilitates the management of course enrollments and student registrations.
    MissingCourseException
    Thrown when an application attempts to operate with a course that has not been registered.
    MissingStudentException
    Thrown when an application attempts to operate with a student that has not been registered.
    Student
    This class allows you to create a student object.
    StudentAlreadyEnrolledException
    Thrown when an application attempts to enroll a student that has already been enrolled.
    StudentAlreadyExistsException
    Thrown when an application attempts to register a student that was already registered.
    StudentBlankInputException
    Thrown when an application attempts to create a student with one or more blank or null fields or a student identifier <=0.
    StudentNotEnrolledException
    Thrown when an application attempts to cancel a student's enrollment in a course in which the student was not previously enrolled.
